content: 1 set-up k m1 k to end - 20 sts work in st st until thumb measures 1 5 3 75 cm change to smaller ndls work in k1 p1 ribbing for 3 rnds bobble loosely finishing weave in ends sew up the gap where the sts were picked up for the thumb using the 4 tail soak pieces in cool water and wool wash and block to measurements published by meghan kelly & hidden river yarns photography kate gagnon osborn ©2017 all rights reserved hiddenriveryarns com v1 9 15 17 info@hiddenriveryarns com // meghan@kelbournewoolens com
